name: dns-resolve
description: Resolve DNS hostname from Route 53 Private Hosted Zones to find corresponding EC2 instances or ENIs. This tool should be called before connectivity-check when using DNS names instead of instance IDs.

hostname.description: DNS hostname to resolve from Route 53 Private Hosted Zone (e.g., app-frontend.examplecorp.com, database.internal.company.com)

dns_name.description: Alternative parameter name for hostname (supports both for compatibility)

region.description: AWS region to search in (default: us-east-1)
